name: output-compile-time-webpack-plugin
description: output-compile-time-webpack-plugin 是一款Webpack插件，用于输出Webpack编译项目所用的时间。

scripts.patch: npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.major: npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish

author: Endless
